title: BOB Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Business Correspondent Coordinator Posts
description: The Bank of Baroda (BOB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Business Correspondent Coordinator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, MBA, MCA, and M.Sc. can apply for the BOB Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selecti...
